website_summaries.verdict: Top choice for cleaning a little one's ears.
pros: Parents love that the LED light and fish-shaped hook make kids feel more comfortable
Light helps parents complete the process faster
Tools are smaller than those in other kits for smaller ear canals
cons: Some reports of light breaking off after repeated use

customer_reviews.title: All you need for earwax removal
customer_reviews.text: This toolset is all you need for earwax removal. The plastic one with LED is especially useful to see clearly the earwax. There are a variety of tools within the box so that you do not need to buy anything else. And it is convenient to use one box to put those tools together in one place. Very easy and comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Weirdly so useful. I'll never go back to q-tips
customer_reviews.text: Weirdly so useful. I'll never go back to q-tips. My favorites are the two metal scoops and the spring.ball like thing which clean out the front of the ear canal super well. If you have allergy-ears or any wax issues get this, it does the job and feels amazing
customer_reviews.author: M Luongo

customer_reviews.title: Cool LED Light ear pick
customer_reviews.text: My son is very sensitive when people touch his ears. Even when he sees the doctor he doesn’t let dr. touch too. So I try this kit to help him clean that big earwax. I like the little fish with LED light ear pick. It is soft and plastic which is not that scary for me the first time to help him. But he saw that fish then let me do it. (The promise is to let him play after) this kit includes others tools which two metals adults can use but others I don’t know what are they for. I still like it because I can help my son clean the earwax from born.
customer_reviews.author: Ming S Zhang

customer_reviews.title: I like e it and so glad we bought it
customer_reviews.text: My son had put a loom rubber band in his ear and we were un able to take it out. Took him to the Dr office, and even the Er. They could not get it out at all. I was desperate! So I bought this little kit and with in minutes I was able to get it out with the fish light. He wasn’t afraid of it because of the shape of a fish so it was so much easier to get it out. I like e it and so glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Dalia Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice stuff! I finally cleaned up my son's ear. When I showed him what was inside he was shocked LOL. But I only use one or two from this set. I don't get the tweezer though. I don't think I will put a sharp point tweezer into someoneas ear. But it is a nice tweezer :D
customer_reviews.author: Peachtree

customer_reviews.title: great design
customer_reviews.text: the ear wax removal set are great, unlike my last ear removal, which problem is head part a little sharp, these does not have the problem, I took a picture zoom out the head part, you can see they are made every detail part great and smooth, I do not need to worry it broken my skin in the ear.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: I brought this kit to help clean my kids ears every once in a while. I knew that using q-tips would push the ear wax further through the canal. I found most of the tools useful when cleaning out their ears, and it was easy and reliable. The LED light was extremely useful. it allowed me to see much further down and was able to take out a lot of wax.
customer_reviews.author: yuan y.

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT FOR TINY EAR CANALS
customer_reviews.text: I have an adult daughter with Down syndrome, here ear canals are very tiny. This was perfect. The lighted handle has three removable tips that can be sterilized. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fish Ear Pick Sucks
customer_reviews.text: The number one item from this package would be the light up ear pick. However the one that comes in this case is junk. The plastic pick easily falls out, is not properly edged so it scratches the inner ear. As soon as you start to scrap a side the piece falls out. I've had to try to hold it in place while using it an now the pink casing has broken into bits and now worthless. The other two tools of import are the traditional ear scoop (all three have short handles which makes it harder to maneuver) and the tweezers (which works fine). The rest of the tools are just clutter and distractions.
customer_reviews.author: chinina

customer_reviews.title: The lighted plastic pick is the only down side.
customer_reviews.text: Almost the whole kit is perfect. The metal tools are of high quality and the case is convenient. The plastic pick with a light however is disappointing. The light is so dim it is practically useless and the pick ends are impossible to secure to the pick handle. The result is the small pick end will fall off into your ear.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Overall it’s ok to buy
customer_reviews.text: The small light tip is flimsy and it came off several times while I was scooping stuff out but that’s about the only thing it was very useful and it’s a good way to get the ear wax out of kids it’s small enough for their ear and the light helps you not go too deep
customer_reviews.author: Vaaal31

customer_reviews.title: The spiral is nice
customer_reviews.text: Never tried the spiral before. Love this spiral tool immediately , very comfortable in use , no sharp edges like some ear wax tool which might cause pain . But still able to get small wax pieces easily . Don't need Q-Tips anymore !
customer_reviews.author: shawny

customer_reviews.title: Very handy ear cleaning tool set.
customer_reviews.text: One quick note, the light comes with a battery already installed. The back opens up on it, where you would think the battery would go but the battery is already installed. No instructions come with the product but it pretty self explanatory to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Very handy ear pick
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with my purchase. The ear pick with lights really helps a lot when cleaning my kids ears. I’m giving it a 4-star because the other pieces are kinda useless, which if not included could have lowered the price.
customer_reviews.author: ylai

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Case included
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this set. I needed to replace my previous ear light and found this nice set. The case is perfect for keeping track of all the tools. I clean my kids ears and my sister who gets a lot of build up so the variety of tools was great. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: pandascandles

customer_reviews.title: Flashlight seems to be the only useful tool
customer_reviews.text: I'm honestly surprised to see so many reviews from people who have actually put these into someone's ear. Recieved this set and realized immediately that I would not feel comfortable using it. The set is good quality and a good bang for your buck but the only thing I use is the flashlight. The other tools seem way too invasive and unsafe to put into someone's ear.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: This product works perfectly and gets the job done also great for the lil ones with ear wax.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be any happier with this product it comes with multiple pieces to use to extract wax from your ear in my case I used it on my 3yr old daughter and it worked really good took everything right out and it comes with a light to insert into the ear so you’re able to see and not hurt yourself or your child I would really recommend this to anyone and especially for the little ones it can come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: kevin d.

customer_reviews.title: Great set.
customer_reviews.text: This product is not bad. It's a great set of ear picking tools but I think it can be slightly improved. The tweezer is slim to fit narrow ear canals but the end is really pointy. Maybe flatten or round it just a bit in case of accidental poking. The plastic picker with light is very amazing BUT the plastic part is too smooth. It has a hard time grabbing.
customer_reviews.author: Dptodk

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a better wood ear cleaner than the cheap plastic scoop this kit came with. The ear wax just falls right off in the ear canal. The light is a great feature but I don’t see it lasting very long. It’s made with real cheap plastic. I had to snap a piece in place after I opened the package. Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Jhan

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and wives with dirty ears
customer_reviews.text: My favorite tool out of this whole kit is the pink little fish! Thats really all you need. It lights up the clear plastic scooper so when you are in the ear you can actually see how deep your going. And if it breaks it has spares inside the handle. So it is great for the price! It will also let you know your wife doesnt clean her ears that often and you can see clear through the other side!
customer_reviews.author: ADAM TREVINO

customer_reviews.title: Plastic fish light is flimsy and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help clean my kids' ears. I love the idea of the tool with the light (the fish), to me it is the most useful. However, my fish thing broke. It is a flimsy plastic. It no longer holds the little plastic scooper in place. I currently have it taped but it just isn't the same. It's just cheaply made, I plan to replace it with another set that has a metal light. The other metal tools seem fine, but I seldom use them.
customer_reviews.author: Mdmeblueberry

customer_reviews.title: Plastic piece for LED Not made well
customer_reviews.text: The product would be great if the plastic piece for LED was made well. The plastic is very cheap, and not smooth. It actually hurts when you use it against your ear. My daughter started screaming, so I tried it myself and it HURTS! The other pieces are not plastic and is fine but I specifically bought this because of the LED feature. No point if you can’t use it cause it’s not made properly.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lee

customer_reviews.title: VERY poor quality, disappointed
customer_reviews.text: TRASH. I bought 2, and one of them didn’t even light up. On the other, the plastic piece holding the tools broke right off the first time I opened it. Cheap and not worth the trouble— don’t get reeled in by the cute design like me.
customer_reviews.author: Megan V.

customer_reviews.title: Great for tonsil stones
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver for my tonsil stones. Especially the flash light with the scooper thing on the end. I was pretty bummed when it broke. But I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JD in OK

customer_reviews.title: very good for skritches
customer_reviews.text: I often have really itchy ears and for a long time used q tips and those were ok enough, then for a while I used a metal collar stay and that worked quite a bit better, then I found these. admittedly most of them are meh, but the 2 scoop shaped ones are amazeballs
customer_reviews.author: Kody

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well, for what I bought it for!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to grasp my daughters ear tube that should have fallen out by now, but hasn’t.. the cute light made her relax when she seen it andthe tweezers grabbed that thing on the 2nd try! Well worth the money and will use it in the future for wax removal for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Wheelie Dealie

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this cheap plastic junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk! Plastic broke into small pieces after few uses. One of plastic tips was sharp... honestly this thing is even dangerous. Avoid it!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The light is great but the plastic attachments do not fit properly. The slightest amount of pressure and they fall right off. Also, the one plastic attachment used for scooping has a rigid edge and it ended up cutting my daughter during the first use. While it did get the job done, construction wise it’s barely a 2 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fair quality but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Came in a nice tin case so I won’t lose the tools. The flashlight portion is definitely not top quality but it gets the job done. The clear tip pops off from time to time and you have to wiggle it a little to get the light to work at its brightest. But for the money, why not snag one? It works well for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: J J

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy works well
customer_reviews.text: This works really well for my son who has problems in the past with impactions of ear wax. Smooth edges no tearing of skin
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: The light up removal tool arrived broken and was so cheap. The light flashed and would not stay on! It had writing on the side that had been rubbed off. Cheap and I returned the package.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Howe

customer_reviews.title: And the best part, it extracts and cleans the ears perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Exact product as pictured. Arrived promptly. And the best part, it extracts and cleans the ears perfectly! The fish light is fantastic. ***Recommendation: wish the fish light interchangeables' were metal instead of the plastic (those can be flimsy).
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah S.

customer_reviews.title: High quality materials.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy solid metal cuild. Doesnt bend or feel flimsy. All of the cleaning tools have a solid feel and weight to them in your hand. I feel like I have full precision control..which is very important in cleaning ears.
customer_reviews.author: Tuan N.

customer_reviews.title: The metal pickers are great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year ago and I did not love the plastic picker. It broke after two uses so I super glued it and then also used the hot glue gun to put it together. I still use it only because of the light I can use it to pick my babies ears safely. I do love the metal picker for myself, it in my opinion is better than the asian ear pickers. Easy cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price! Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: The little scoops are great and I love the forceps. The light tool actually comes with detachable pieces (mini forceps and 2 scoops also) which is cool. My ears have impacted ear wax pretty bad so I haven’t been able to get it out but I can grab it with the forceps. Hopefully after using softening drops will help. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Aston

customer_reviews.title: My man loves this
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, thick and sturdy. The light one makes it so much easier to use vs how I do it back in the days holding a flash light and picking while holding the ear, such was a struggle thank god for these!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for childeren with smaller ear canals
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter. Her ear canals are small and the "fish" tool works perfect cleaning them. The light stopped working in a few day but I use a headlamp anyway because the light is better.
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. My daughter is frequently asking me to clean her ears which I am usually terrified to do. This kit allows me to use the light to see what is in there and tools to remove it. It would be a 5 start review if plastic scoop that lights up was not so sharp and caused my daughter to flinch. I now use it just as a light and the metal scoop to do the work.
customer_reviews.author: Ns

customer_reviews.title: DONT
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the most useless thing I have ever bought. tossed out
customer_reviews.author: Phillip R. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect. Great price. I've bought light up ear scoops from other companies before and sometimes they show up and the light doesnt work right away. This one works right away and hasnt failed me yet.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool, box helps keep them together.
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with all of the items included. I esp love the ones with the LED picker, makes it easier to use on someone. I just wish the metal scoop were a little thinner and finer.
customer_reviews.author: Wingsofnina

customer_reviews.title: Not a good quality
customer_reviews.text: The pink plastic one broke in 2 uses. The other tiny spoons are too small to hold and reach your ears. Not useful at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kaisup

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother with any ear solutions just use this
customer_reviews.text: This is what worked when my ears were obstructed for days.. I tried using those solutions you drip into your ear but they didn’t work at all, they kind of make it worse. And I just wasted my money before getting these This is the best tools, just follow the instructions not to hurt yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Shadinasty

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, poor quality of the tools
customer_reviews.text: I just use 2 of the 6 pcs because it’s seems to me very aggressive to use the others. The quality is poor, the case is nice and helpful to keep all the pcs in a place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small metal instruments as described
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what i was thinking buying this. Prompt delivery. Comes in a metal box to store small instruments. For a safer cleaning, save your money and go to the doctor.
customer_reviews.author: punkin pie

customer_reviews.title: Versatile toolkit
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a single ear pick which was easily got lost. so each time I have to put it somewhere that would not be touched by the kids and other family members. This ear pick kits has a variety of different picks and is much more powerful than my old one. The LED light is especially useful for my son. he is prone to get ear infection after the swimming. With this new kit, I am more confident to clean his ear now.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Does what its needed for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I saw HELLA earwax in my boyfriends ear and honestly really just wanted to take it out, let me tell you it worked great!!! Did the job, all the tools are in a case which makes it great if you want to bring it to travel, the only bad thing was the light i got with it, super cute design but i have to put the button in a certain spot for the light to turn on or else it flicks on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Product was as advertised and very good quality. I’m very satisfied with my purchase. My package got a little roughed up but I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: DLeal

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I use this to clean my one son's ears who gets build up. This is a great way to make sure all the junk is out and not just hope. I wish they made a silicon coated end though for kids. Overall win win
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Lots of tools
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice little kit. My ears were a little sensitive to the metal, and it felt a little sharp, but I'm also just used to cotton qtips. Pretty interesting though!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah B

customer_reviews.title: Useful kit with plenty of different sizes and tools for the ear canal
customer_reviews.text: I have Meniere's disease and get that tickly ear canal feeling often. These tools feel like quality and assist in scratching that itch and maintaining clean ear canals. Includes nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than q tips
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for almost a year now. It is amazing, it doesn't show signs of corrosion. The case makes it hard to lose. I think this is a much cheaper alternative to q tips
customer_reviews.author: darklyger64

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little set
customer_reviews.text: You may become so obsessed with cleaning ears you quit your day job.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: My kids love the light up fish
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and my kids love the light up fish! They think it’s eating the “bugs” in their ears haha. One child has very dry ear wax the other has wet ear wax and the tips work with both types very well :)
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would so great because I can wash after each use. But the steak really is rough on my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer F.

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: the LED light needed a little tweeking as the light would not stay on, had to fix the on/off switch and battery connection...but everything else is great
customer_reviews.author: Susan Soder

customer_reviews.title: Really great tools to have
customer_reviews.text: Bought two! One for myself and one for my kid who has massive earwax issues. The spoon type tool is the best.
customer_reviews.author: lady of the house

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Got it but didn’t use much cause it didn’t seem like it was for use on a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ackers

customer_reviews.title: Good set to get your wax out
customer_reviews.text: really easy to use, different kinds of tools in different shapes are available. The one with the led light is really useful
customer_reviews.author: Priyekant

customer_reviews.title: It was ok.
customer_reviews.text: Not as great as I was hoping for. The light just help, but not like I thought it was going to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: like this a lot
customer_reviews.text: like this a lot. the light helps to see very clearly. i dont have to use my phone for light anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Hana Cho

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: they work saved me a trip to ENT for constant cleaning for my kiddo
customer_reviews.author: pumpkins4sale

customer_reviews.title: Quality set!
customer_reviews.text: Stainless Steel instruments. Quality set! Only wish the handles were a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: LuvOnlineShopping

customer_reviews.title: My Ears loves them! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Yes!!!! My ears love them ❤️ I'm used to cotton buds but Qtips here in the U.S are just hella big!!! 😈 Good thing i found them here on Amazon 👏 I like how they have their own container as well. Kudos!
customer_reviews.author: RMac

customer_reviews.title: Great ear spelunking kit
customer_reviews.text: Tweezers don’t work very well because the tips don’t line up flush but everything else is good.
customer_reviews.author: Emily_has_spoken

customer_reviews.title: Every Family Needs This.
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat this price. I consider it a personal hygiene/first aid essential.
customer_reviews.author: Cheshire Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Normal
customer_reviews.text: Ear picks are a bit thick, uncomfortable and can't dig out
customer_reviews.author: NA WANG

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Loved the pink one with the lights, made cleaning my kids' ears so much easier. But I wish some of the tools had lights too and longer. I guess I will mostly using the pink plastic tools.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My son has terrible ear wax and when I came across this product, I had to have it. The package arrived and the tools all came in a nice silver tin. I used the fish with the light on him to pick out his ear wax and he was so intrigued.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bellnap

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great product for moms/dads to use on their little ones
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product for moms/dads to use on their little ones. I have 2 kids; a 4 year old and 7 year old and they absolutely love this product. They lay completely still and allow me to remove their ear wax safely. The lighted tip WORKS WONDER. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Working great for baby
customer_reviews.text: Working great for baby. The light up tip is really helpful to clean baby ear rail. Recommend it to anyone who has new baby
customer_reviews.author: Esther H.

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I quickly received the goods, I couldn't wait to open it, the packaging was very careful, the box was very delicate, the light with the ear pick was so good, I don't have to worry about hurting my baby, I would like to buy some more for my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I tried them to my child and it works great. If you use ear wax together, it works even better.
customer_reviews.author: Jospeh

customer_reviews.title: Mixed review
customer_reviews.text: The tools are well made & good quality. The light is cheaply made in my opinion. But the tools do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jerseylin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The tools are all nice. I liked the light ear cleaner, but it broke prettt fast.
customer_reviews.author: Erica K

customer_reviews.title: Love the case it came with. Light doesn't work. have to buy batteries
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use on my kid. He likes the curette /spoon and the one that has a spiral tip;but is scared actually of the fish(light). Had to buy new batteries as mine has been used when it came. Tip is made of cheap plastic that will easily break. I wouldn't dare insert it inside anyone's ear. Also,
customer_reviews.author: momof2dragons

customer_reviews.title: The middle tools are actually very great I just wish that the plastic LED light was ...
customer_reviews.text: The middle tools are actually very great I just wish that the plastic LED light was a little bit more adorable. It just feels weak?
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: I can now clean everyone’s ears instead of waiting for a doctor’s appointment and driving to the clinic just to remove earwax.
customer_reviews.author: erma payne

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: The material used to make the item isn't good but I wouldn't call it terrible. It is fully functional although beware of the picks and box rusting if they ever get wet when washing.
customer_reviews.author: Kevinnn

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for my son! Love the light on it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Olson

customer_reviews.title: confutable
customer_reviews.text: My favorite is the whorled one, which not only cleans earwax, but also massages it. Easy to use, especially the little light.
customer_reviews.author: Cody L

customer_reviews.title: Okay products
customer_reviews.text: My case came damaged, but the ears diggers weren't. I wish they have a spoon one it'll be better .
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to use on my girls. I’m a nurse - so, I’m comfortable using the tools. Not sure this is for anyone to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use. Great for checking children’s ear especially if they have tiny ear canal. I recommend using this.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: My child has ear infection problems and this allows him ...
customer_reviews.text: My child has ear infection problems and this allows him to clean his ear even if it has mild inflammation.
customer_reviews.author: Kamikazi

customer_reviews.title: Complete Crap!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money! The metal pieces are fine but the lighted piece is cheap plastic and the light stayed on and worked for about 2 minutes, then stopped working. Now I am back to looking for a new one. I would actually give it zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: I love using the fish light pick
customer_reviews.text: I love using the fish light pick. It really helps out instead of trying to hold a flashlight and using a pick. It makes multitasking easy :)
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: With some of the pieces were sturdy but it does the job
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Especially good
customer_reviews.text: Things are really good, the baby's ears are very comfortable, the material is also very good, the ear things can be seen very clearly, and soft, not afraid to hurt the baby.
customer_reviews.author: janell cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is so fun to do and easy to use! Shows all the nasty stuff
customer_reviews.author: Calliexas00

customer_reviews.title: Useablity is great for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: Like that this works for the whole family. All the way from our 1 year old at the time to us as adults.
customer_reviews.author: Flores

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is very delicate, the quality is also good, easy to store and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Vickery

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The attachments for the light up wand do not fit, they fall out anytime I try to use it. Garbage. The other utensils are fine.
customer_reviews.author: BRT1118

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Praise, very practical. The light is also very bright, and the silicone head is very soft, but I am worried that it will fall, but it will not.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably prices
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean my daughters ears and the light on the end is amazing. Makes it so easy to do, but feels a little flimsy but you should be gentle when cleaning anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Venessa Lopez

product_meta.title: 6pcs Ear Pick, Ronten Ear Curette LED Light Earwax Removal with Storage Box
product_meta.description:
Style:Fish Ear Pick

Ear wax is a substance made in your ear to protect the skin from water and infection, according to the American Hearing Research Foundation.

The wax can trap bacteria, dust and foreign particles from getting in your ear. Sometimes, this wax builds up and gets trapped in your ear. Need to remove ear wax with a cerumen spoon.


Instructions:

Step 1: Slowly insert the scoop ear wax remover into your ear canal. (Don't insert too deep in case it might hurt your ear drum) 

Step 2: Gently scoop your ear canal wall to loosen the ear wax clinging on the wall.

Step 3: Gently scoop out the impacted build-up ear wax out with the earwax cleaner.

Step 4: Gently clean the debris and massage your ear canal with the spiral head remover.


Note: 

1. Clean the earwax removal tool with alcohol before using.

2. Please help and guide your child to use ear wax kit gently and carefully, do not put them too deep into your ear canal .

3. Consult a doctor for help if your ear have any discomfort while using the ear wax cleaner removal.


Package includes:

4 *ear pick 

1* ear forceps 

1*LED earwax
feature_bullets: STAINLESS STEEL: 100% Medical grade stainless steel, durable and anti-rust, easy to clean and sterilize. The ear cleaning kit are safe for personal and family use when used correctly.

EAR PICK WITH LIGHT: LED Ear Pick with ON/OFF switch for clear vision. Flashlight for seeing the ear-hole clearly after express the red button on the side for turning on the LED flashlight, easy to ear cleaning.
EAR FORCEPS: The ear scoop just perfect for reaching very difficult small openings to remove tiny screws.
SPIRAL EAR SPOON: The ear wax removal tool equip with spiral ear spoon can 360 rotating which help you clear your ear completely.

PORTABLE METAL BOX: Easy and convenient for you to store, portable and lightweight ear picks wax removal. Easy to keep the ear picking kit when you are at home or traveling. And well-designed package, can be a super gift for friends.
